item.title: Blum & Co transforms the cheongsam into stylish workwear
item.description:
Blum, a Singaporean fashion brand, has launched a new line of workwear inspired by the traditional cheongsam. Source: Blum & Co. Emerging in the 1920s as a symbol of women’s liberation, the cheongsam has undergone stylistic changes throughout the years. Originally a loose-fitting, full-sleeved dress, it evolved to feature a slimmer silhouette with shorter hemlines and a side slit. Despite being prohibited in mainland China following the communist revolution, the cheongsam remained popular in Hong Kong...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/blum-co-transforms-the-cheongsam-into-stylish-workwear/
